0: Y'all might as well get the music ready because this finna' take a while
1: Umm, When I had my accident I found out at that moment nothing in life is promised except death,
2: If you had the opportunity to play this game of life
3: you need to arpeeeciate every moment

18: And I plan to celebrate, I plan to celebrate and scream and pop champagne every chance I get becasue i'm at the grammys baby!
title: 47th Annual Grammy Speech
